fast3d.renderables

Class Callout

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.renderables.Callout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class Callout
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    a callout is a 2d-text floating on a 3d-location, facing the camera, heading up
    the callout uses a built-in font class
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Callout.Text
      the class to represent the awt-font but with further information

      called when this renderables is requested to draw itself on screen on the way prior calculated by shade()
      void shade(Graphics3d g)
      called when this renderable is requested to calculate where to draw on screen
      the graphics-context is not clipped, so it is greatly needed to really just draw itself
      during this method is is highly recommended to not draw anything

      • shade

        public void shade(Graphics3d g)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        called when this renderable is requested to calculate where to draw on screen
        the graphics-context is not clipped, so it is greatly needed to really just draw itself
        during this method is is highly recommended to not draw anything
        Specified by:
        shade in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        g - the 3d-graphics-context to do calculations, not null

      • render

        public void render(Graphics3d g)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        called when this renderables is requested to draw itself on screen on the way prior calculated by shade()
        Specified by:
        render in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        g - the 3d-graphics-context to do drawings, not null

      • getPos

        public Vector3d getPos()
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        should not return null
        should return a reference (should not must)
        Specified by:
        getPos in interface Renderable
        Returns:
        the center-position of the renderable used to determine when the render-call should be done between call of other renderables in the universe to not hide this one behind some renderable actually behind it

      • getPosVector3d

        public Pixel getPosVector3d()
        Returns:

      • rayTrace

        public Vector3d rayTrace(Vector3d s,
                         Vector3d r)
        rayTrace is not supported for callouts

        Parameters:

      • getVertices

        public Vector3d[] getVertices()
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        should return every vertex used during render() to accelerate the shading and rendering
        a renderable is requested to return all its vertices here
        may return null if no vertices are used for whatever reason or the vertices are not known yet
        Specified by:
        getVertices in interface Renderable
        Returns:
        the callouts position

      • getColor

        public Color getColor()
        Specified by:
        getColor in interface Renderable
        Returns:
        the current visible color of the renderable (preferred as a reference)
